=API for json.write=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.json.write))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_json-str_x) json-str] [#print-json print-json] 

----
===(_json-str_ x)===
<pre> Converts Clojure data structures to a JSON-formatted string.</pre>
----
===_print-json_===
<pre> Prints Clojure data types as JSON.  Nil becomes JSON null.
Keywords become strings, without the leading colon.  Maps become
JSON objects, all other collection types become JSON arrays.
Strings and numbers print as with pr.</pre>
